instructions: Open Google Chrome on your phone. Tap the three dots in the upper-right corner. Tap Settings . Tap Search engine . How To Change Default Search Engine In Chrome On Android How To Change Default Search Engine In Chrome On Android How To Change Default Search Engine In Chrome On Android Source: Joe Maring / Android Central Choose which search engine you want (Yahoo!, Bing, or DuckDuckGo). Tap the back arrow in the upper-left corner to go back.
